amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part C of House Report 115-677 to remove the first 1,500 individuals residing on military bases from calculation into population thresholds set for "rural areas.'.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part C of House Report 115-677 to remove the first 1,500 individuals residing on military bases from calculation into population thresholds set for "rural areas.'.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jones amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Jones.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jones amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
